meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7117.

td.p: Jake Smith, a wine salesman from Memphis, Tennessee
Eliza Thompson, an entertainment editor from Brooklyn, New York
Scott Lord, a construction attorney from Santa Monica, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $29,001)

tr.td: THE NON‑DEPRESSING 1930s
FILMS INSPIRED BY MAGAZINE ARTICLES
AMERICANA
LIGHTHOUSES
"PAT"
I'D LIKE TO SOLVE THE PUZZLE

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
